title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new with Amazon S3 (STG206)
title_cn:
I don't have access to specific information about AWS re:Invent 2025 sessions or what was announced in the "What's new with Amazon S3 (STG206)" session. Since re:Invent 2025 would be a future event from my knowledge cutoff, I can't provide details about new S3 features that may have been announced there.

To get the most current information about new S3 features and announcements, I'd recommend:

- Checking the official AWS re:Invent website and session recordings
- Reviewing the AWS What's New page (https://aws.amazon.com/new/)
- Looking at the AWS S3 documentation for recent updates
- Following AWS official blogs and announcements

If you have specific questions about existing S3 features or need help with S3 configurations, I'd be happy to assist with those.
abstract: Amazon S3 consistently delivers new innovations to help you store, manage, analyze, and protect any amount of data for virtually any use case. Discover S3's latest breakthroughs including S3 Tables enhancements delivering fully managed Apache Iceberg support, S3 Vectors with native vector support at scale for AI applications, S3 Metadata for instant data discovery, and S3 Express One Zone's ultra-low latency performance. Learn how these innovations optimize for different data types and workloads, increase performance, simplify operations, and lower costs for analytics, AI/ML, and high-performance computing applications. This session provides implementation strategies, live demonstrations, and practical insights to immediately optimize your data architecture.
abstract_cn: Amazon S3 持续提供新的创新功能，帮助您存储、管理、分析和保护任何数量的数据，适用于几乎任何使用场景。了解 S3 的最新突破，包括提供完全托管 Apache Iceberg 支持的 S3 Tables 增强功能、为 AI 应用程序提供大规模原生向量支持的 S3 Vectors、用于即时数据发现的 S3 Metadata，以及 S3 Express One Zone 的超低延迟性能。了解这些创新如何针对不同的数据类型和工作负载进行优化，提高性能，简化操作，并降低分析、AI/ML 和高性能计算应用程序的成本。本次会议提供实施策略、现场演示和实用见解，帮助您立即优化数据架构。
